data.text: @JoshMeyerDC Don’t you think if they actually did their job we would have some of these answers? I’m all for holding the president accountable but the media lost its way a long time ago.

@JoshMeyerDC There’s a ton of questions about the wars America is fighting in, along with a ton of other policy questions that could be asked. The press is too busy focusing on Acosta/Trump love/hate relationship to focus on topics that really matter to people outside the media echo chamber.
